channel.title: Closed
channel.description: When i use playerHasItemAmount for runecrafting unnoted essence it doesnt work unless there noted so how would i make a requirement of 28 unnoted essence to rc if noone knows ill try the repeating void thing, i need to know how to make a void call another

item.title: Closed
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

[quote=“Mod Adam, post:9, topic:174158”]Use a simple for loop.

if (playerHasItemAmount(1436, 28) { for (int i = 0; i < 29; i ++) { deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), i); addItem(554, i); addSkillXP(1000, 20); sendMessage("You craft some Runes."); } else { sendMessage("You don't have the required amount of Essence."); } }

Check my code, I just quickly typed that up.[/quote]
i thought about using the loop also but, if i did anyone can use 1 essence and get 28 in return
i made a looping void, and it works
thanks though

Read full topic

item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

100 errors no matter where i add :[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2008, 02:35:57 PM[/size][hr]nvm i got it, ill test[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2008, 02:42:07 PM[/size][hr]yea it tries to find the item in a stack, instead of the whole inventory and how many sloys of it you have
so i guess ill have to repeat method
thanks for all your help

item.title: Closed
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“BurnInSilence, post:3, topic:174158”]public void RcFires(); //fires if(playerHasItemAmount(1436, 28)==true){ deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 28); addItem(554, 28); addSkillXP(1000, 20); }[/quote]

You don’t need the “== true.” It’s messy.

So you would do this:

public void RcFires(); //fires if(playerHasItemAmount(1436, 28)){ deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 28); addItem(554, 28); addSkillXP(1000, 20); } else if(!playerHasItemAmount(1436, 28) { sendMessage("You don't have 28 essence."); }

Read full topic

that is the one that 1436, 28 tries to find them stacked
i had

public void RcAirs(); //Airs if(playerHasItemAmount(1436, 1)==true){ deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); addItem(556, 1); addSkillXP(50, 20); RcAirs(); }
to try to allow rc no matter how many ess you have
neither worked :\
